title: Advancing sustainable bioplastics: chemical and physical modification of starch films for enhanced thermal and barrier properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23943-23951
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04263H, Paper

Pooja N., Shashank S., Bhisham Narayan Singh, Nirmal Mazumder
This study addresses the urgent need for sustainable alternatives to conventional plastics by focusing on modification of thermoplastic starch (TPS) derived from renewable biomass sources.
